lines.text: The other side has been robbing us for 20 years. Why not give us a chnace.
I want tax reform, school reform...
[The Twine family ghosts want to help Lemuel win the election, but a ghostly matriarch objects]
Since when have we become trouble-shooters for dimwit mortals?
Very well, if you can't keep a civil tongue in your mouth, I'll thank you for my trumpet and be gone.
